title: Seeds of the Lemon Grove
description: Every young man has a journey and every journey has an end. Against the background of Sicily, Phillip LaChiana is transformed from an American on vacation to a young man overwhelmed by his newfound Sicilian culture. Sangue lava lu sangue, blood washes blood, demands he must confront his father's killer. ----------------------------------------------------------- Reminiscent of The Godfather, Seeds of the Lemon Grove envelops you in the flower-scented realm of a paradise unmatched in unapologetic brutality. It leads the reader to the personal understanding of the potential violence that exists in all of us. Cudos to Joe D'Amato for this fine work. Dennis Fishel-author of Russell's Revenge In Seeds of the Lemon Grove, Joe D'Amato has crafted a brilliant and intimate account of a society still cloaked in mystery. He has uncovered the harsh reality of Sicily's violent heritage. Barry Raut, author of Devils' Gold.
author: Joe D'Amato
